cosmos.question: I'm big and bright, I come out at night. I help you see, with my silvery light. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I change my shape sometimes, like a cookie being eaten!
🐺 Werewolves howl at me!
🌌 I orbit the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am very hot and give off light, I rise in the East, shining bright. What am I?

hints.text: 🌻 Plants need me to grow!
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me.
🔥 I'm a giant ball of fire!

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas, far away, twinkling like glass. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I appear small but I'm usually enormous!
🧭 Sailors used to use me to find their way.
🔭 You can see me at night when it is dark.

cosmos.question: I'm a big ball of rock and land, where you live and play in the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 💧I have lots of water.
🏠 People live on me.
🌎 I'm the third planet from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I'm red and dusty, a rusty hue, some say there might be life on me too. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People send robots to explore me.
🍫 My name is similar to a chocolate bar.
🔴 I'm the fourth planet from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I'm a group of stars, a cosmic design, like a bear, a hunter, or a lion's sign. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some have animals in their names.
🌌 Ancient people told stories about me.
🔗 I am a pattern of stars

cosmos.question: I am very big and made of gas, with a giant red spot that forever lasts. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I have lots of storms.
🪐 I have lots of moons.
🖐 I am the biggest planet in our Solar System.

cosmos.question: I have bright rings made of icy dust, they are pretty, that's a must! What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rock.
🪐 I am far away from the Sun, so I am cold!
🧊 I'm the sixth planet from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars, dust, and gas, held together, a swirling mass. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I can be spiral, elliptical, or irregular.
🌌 Our Sun is part of me.
🥛 I contain billions of stars.

cosmos.question: I travel in space, a frozen ball, with a tail that glows, big or small. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am made of ice, dust, and gas.
☀️ I get brighter as I approach the Sun.
💨 My tail always points away from the Sun.

ocean.question: I'm big and blue, and fish swim through. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I'm home to whales.
🌊 Boats sail on me.
💧 I'm made of water.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slow. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm not a fast runner.
🥬 I like to eat seaweed.
🏠 I carry my home on my back.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squirt ink.
⚫ I don't have bones.
🖐️ I have many arms to grab things.

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and have many sharp teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 Some people are scared of me.
🐟 I eat fish.
🎬 You've probably seen me in a movie.

ocean.question: I'm a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am small and pretty.
🏘️ I live with other fish.
🌈 I come in many bright colors.

ocean.question: I'm a mammal that swims in the ocean and makes clicking sounds. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I am very smart.
🗣️ I use sounds to talk to my friends.
🐳 I am not a fish, I breathe air.

ocean.question: I am a very large creature that lives in the ocean and has baleen instead of teeth. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am the largest animal on Earth.
🦐 I eat tiny sea creatures.
🎶 People study my songs

ocean.question: I'm a star-shaped creature that lives on the ocean floor and can grow back my arms. What am I?

hints.text: ⭐ I am not in the sky.
🌊 I live under the sea.
🖐️ If I lose an arm, I can grow a new one!

ocean.question: I'm a place under the sea where many plants and animals live together. It is made of many tiny creatures. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 Many colorful fish live in me.
🧱 I'm built by small animals over a long time.
☀️ I need sunlight to survive.

ocean.question: I am the highest point of a wave. What am I?

hints.text: 🏄‍♀️ Surfers like to be on me.
🌊 I am at the top.
🏔️ People sometimes compare me to a mountain.
